metadata.title: CVE-2020-19751 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. The gf_odf_del_ipmp_tool function inodf_code.c has a heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
